segments.text: Good morning , sir . Is there a bank near here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is one . 5 blocks away from here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , that's too far.Can you change some money for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Surely , of course . What kind of currency have you got ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much would you like to change ?
segments.speaker: S2
